      • createActivity

        public static boolean createActivity(Activity activity,
                                     Note note,
                                     AssignmentPopup assignmentPopup,
                                     Assignee assignee)
        Saves the properly assigned activity and its note to database. this method will ask the toplocation to revalidateModel which calls the setting methods on the entity commited in the bundle. the pcf page calling this method should handle the returned boolean correctly. for example, it should only close the worksheet when return value is true and leave the worksheet open to display errors when the return is false.
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity to create
        note - Note to associate with activity
        assignmentPopup - For selecting assignees from a list
        assignee - Assignable entity to whom Activity is assigned
        Returns:
        true if no error occurs

      • createActivity

        public static boolean createActivity(Activity activity,
                                     Note note,
                                     AssignmentPopup assignmentPopup,
                                     Assignee assignee,
                                     java.lang.String[] associatedArrays)
        Saves the properly assigned activity and its note to database. this method will ask the toplocation to revalidateModel which calls the setting methods on the entity commited in the bundle. the pcf page calling this method should handle the returned boolean correctly. for example, it should only close the worksheet when return value is true and leave the worksheet open to display errors when the return is false.
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity to create
        note - Note to associate with activity
        assignmentPopup - For selecting assignees from a list
        assignee - Assignable entity to whom Activity is assigned
        associatedArrays - names of arrays held by Activity to which entities may have been added -- allows arrays defined as an extension to be persisted along with the associated new Activity
        Returns:
        true if no error occurs

      • createActivity

        public static boolean createActivity(Activity activity,
                                     Note note)
        Saves the activity and its note to database. this method will ask the toplocation to revalidateModel which calls the setting methods on the entity commited in the bundle. the pcf page calling this method should handle the returned boolean correctly. for example, it should only close the worksheet when return value is true and leave the worksheet open to display errors when the return is false.
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity to create
        note - Note to associate with activity
        Returns:
        true if no error occurs

      • createActivity

        public static boolean createActivity(Activity activity,
                                     Note note,
                                     java.lang.String[] associatedArrays)
        Saves the activity and its note to database. this method will ask the toplocation to revalidateModel which calls the setting methods on the entity commited in the bundle. the pcf page calling this method should handle the returned boolean correctly. for example, it should only close the worksheet when return value is true and leave the worksheet open to display errors when the return is false.
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity to create
        note - Note to associate with activity
        associatedArrays - names of arrays held by Activity to which entities may have been added -- allows arrays defined as an extension to be persisted along with the associated new Activity
        Returns:
        true if no error occurs

      • markActivityAsViewed

        public static void markActivityAsViewed(Activity activity)
        Calls the given activity's setAsViewed method and commits the change in a separate bundle, with validation turned off. Used to mark an activity as viewed before displaying it in the UI
        Parameters:
        activity - the activity to be viewed

      • setPreviousUserOnNewActivity

        public static void setPreviousUserOnNewActivity(Activity activity,
                                                User previousUser)
        Attempts to set the PreviousUser field on the given Activity. If the Activity is not new (that is, activity.isNew() returns false) then this method will not take any action on the specified Activity. If the Activity is new, then the PreviousUser will be set to the specified user.
        Parameters:
        activity - the activity on which to operate
        previousUser - the relevant user to be marked as the Activity's previousUser.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if a required argument is Null.
